content: Moderator's hat off! "Secret America" episode #1 will air on the Discovery Channel Sunday, May 27th at 10 p.m. ET/ 9 p.m. CT This first episode focuses on the Statue of Liberty, the Great Seal, the Society of the Cincinnati, the American Flag, the White House, and the street plan of Washington D.C., while the second hour (air date is still TBD) explores Mt. Rushmore, the Washington Monument, the Capitol Building, the Lincoln Memorial, the Liberty Bell, and the Library of Congress. My friend and Vietnam buddy, Marc Leepson will be interviewed on this episode. The interview was filmed on board the destroyer Barry, the museum ship at the Navy Yard in Washington. Marc is a Historian, Author and Journalist. I have read all of his books (I paid full price for them). My favorite is, Flag: an American Biography. My grandson, Caleb used it for a biography book report and got an “A” on his paper. Marc is very involved in Veteran’s affairs. You can learn more about Marc at: *http://www.marcleepson.com/ For more information on this series: *http://dsc.discovery.com/tv-schedules/daily.html?date=20090517.137 God and the soldier, All men adore, In time of trouble, And no more; For when war is over, And all things righted, God is neglected - The old soldier slighted. Founding Member Original DVG & Proud Member, Rupterd Duck/Derelict Veterans
